description: personal study ID composed by the first authors’ first surname_year of publication_first title word
name of data subset – can include different experiments within data set/ different training conditions/ pre-test data/ etc
year the data point was obtained
month the data point was obtained
day of the month the data point was obtained
name of the participant
age presented in years – see metadata for source of age
sex of the participant
role of the participant – focal participant_left
name of the participant_2
age presented in years of the participant_2 – see metadata for source of age
sex of the participant_2
role of the participant_2 – focal participant_right
species of individuals participating in the study -bonobo/chimpanzee
name of the two participants that compose the dyad
sex  of the participants
training phase participants received prior to the test – 1 (individual) / 2 (dyadic)
set of trials - mostly occurring on the same day - usually numerical
presentation of the experiment to the participants - usually numerical
condition participants received – competition(four pieces of foods) / social_dilemma(one piece of food)
name of the participant that pulled in a given trial
elapsed time in seconds between the opening of the doors and the first pull of participant_left
elapsed time in seconds between the opening of the doors and the first pull of participant_right
reward quantity each participant received in a given trial – name of the participant
reward quantity each participant received in a given trial – name of the participant
minimum latency in seconds
whether only one participant of the dyad pulled or both
